name: 1shot-telegram-bot
description: This is a starter repo for building a Telegram bot (built with [python-telegram-bot](https://python-telegram-bot.org/)) based on the  [FastAPI](https://fastapi.tiangolo.com/) web framework. It demonstrates how to perform conversation flows, call the 1Shot API to  trigger onchain transactions, and handle webhook callbacks from both Telegram and 1Shot API.
